Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: An estimated 7000 Shas followers filled the Yad Eliahu Stadium in Tel Aviv to mark the anniversary of the death of the renowned scholar and teacher, Rabbi Haim Ben Moshe Attar, known as the Or Hachaim (The Light of Life).
